page.title: 19A Family Sunday
page.content: We all usually get up at 9 o'clock except my gran, she usually gets up about 9.30.We get washed and dressed and have breakfast, sometimes on a Sunday we have bacon and eggs. After I have helped mum do the drying up I go out to play. Most Sundays Dad washes the car and sometimes I help him.Then I go and call for Elizabeth my friend who lives just over the road.When the day is nice I sometimes take Tia,my grans little dog,for a walk.If we're hungry we have a snack or some ice cream,then I go out to play again. At about 6 o'clock we have dinner and I help wash up after that.Then we go and watch television.At 7 o'clock I have a bath and hair wash.At about 8 o'clock I go to bed.
